All functions

get_psrc_hts()
Retrieve PSRC travel survey data
hts_bin_age()
Add binned age variables Requires `age` variable
hts_bin_commute_freq()
Add simplified commute frequency variable Requires `commute_freq` variable
hts_bin_commute_mode()
Add simplified commute mode variable Requires `commute_mode` variable
hts_bin_dest_purpose()
Add destination purpose classifications Requires `dest_purpose` variable
hts_bin_edu()
Add simplified education variable Requires `education` variable
hts_bin_gender()
Add simplified gender variable Requires `gender` variable
hts_bin_hhsize()
Add simplified household size variable Requires `hhsize` variable
hts_bin_income()
Add binned income variables Requires `hhincome_broad` variable
hts_bin_industry_sector()
Add generalized industry classification Requires `industry` variable
hts_bin_lum_sector()
Add land use modeling industry classification Requires `industry` variable
hts_bin_mode()
Add simplified mode classification Requires `mode_characterization` variable
hts_bin_rent_own()
Add simplified tenure variable Requires `rent_own` variable
hts_bin_sexuality()
Add simplified sexuality variable Requires `sexuality` variable
hts_bin_telecommute_freq()
Add simplified telework time variable Requires `telecommute_freq` variable
hts_bin_telecommute_trichotomy()
Add telecommute status variable Requires `telecommute_freq` and `workplace` variables
hts_bin_telework_time()
Add simplified telework time variable Requires `telework_time` variable
hts_bin_transit_mode_acc()
Add simplified transit access mode classification Requires `mode_acc` variable
hts_bin_vehicle_count()
Add simplified vehicle count variables Requires `vehicle_count` variable
hts_bin_worker()
Add simplified worker status variable Requires `employment` variable
hts_wgt_var()
Return weight variable name
psrc_hts_stat()
Summarize PSRC travel survey data
psrc_hts_varsearch()
Search PSRC travel survey variable definitions
variable_value_lookup
steps for internal acs table lookup
